main event: On September 8, 1962, a sighting of one large and two smaller white objects over Joplin, Missouri was reported.
interesting points: The objects were observed for a duration of 3 hours.,The objects made no sound and left no trail.,The sighting involved one large object in front with two smaller objects trailing behind.,The objects were sighted at approximately 45 degrees above the horizon.,There was no discernible movement or features on the objects during the observation.
sighted object: one large white object and two smaller white objects
